summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 9 requirements with comprehensive frontend and backend code. Internet Identity authentication is implemented for both owner/admin and regular users with proper access controls. The partner/sponsor/affiliate tracking system includes subscription-based access control. Stripe payment integration is present in the admin interface. The pink and purple Twitch-themed design is implemented throughout. The bio section about the medical mute gamer girl is present with inspirational content. The Twitch button linking to https://www.twitch.tv/auroramoonveil is prominently displayed. Backend storage for partner data and subscription management is fully implemented in Motoko.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with name field and profile setup modal
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify user profile creation or management features. The implementation includes ProfileSetupModal, saveCallerUserProfile, getCallerUserProfile, and UserProfile types that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Payment success and failure callback pages
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention payment success/failure pages or Stripe webhook handling. Routes for /payment-success and /payment-failure were added without being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: User role query system with getCallerUserRole endpoint
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies admin authentication but does not request a general user role query system. The implementation adds UserRole types and role queries beyond the specified admin/user distinction.

hallucinated_features.description: Theme provider with dark/light mode toggle capability
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies pink and purple Twitch-themed design but does not mention theme switching or dark/light mode functionality.
BuildRequest does not specify any attribution or third-party service links in the footer beyond Twitch social links.
